content: times k1 13 st k2tog 6 times k1 7 st baby knit 3 rounds k2tog across the round 37 st knit 1 round k2tog 18 times k1 19 st knit 1 round k2tog 9 times k1 10 st if you find it easier switch to double-pointed needles as the number of stitches decrease finishing break yarn and thread onto a darning needle pass needle through remaining stitches and draw up thread tightly fasten_off and sew in ends block as required decorate with a pom-pom if desired follow heathermaid www instagram com/heathermaid/ www facebook com/heathermaid page 3 of 3 ©heathermaid designs 2018 version 2
